channel.title: machine-learning on Jonathan Loscalzo
channel.description: Recent content in machine-learning on Jonathan Loscalzo

item.title: Diverse Topics of Machine Learning
item.description: I am going to gather diverse topics of ML, but I won’t discuss none of them. I gathered them because these are not technical topics per se, are more related to theory or part of the ecosystem. General: Machine Learning from Wikipedia AI transform playbook machine-learning-yearning statistical inference in one sentence [data jujitsu][http://radar.oreilly.com/2012/07/data-jujitsu.html] Rules of ML - martin.zinkevich and summary here Problem Framing SE4ML AI Literacy What is AI Literacy?

item.title: Regression Metrics
item.description: I’ve been writing a summary of the most common regression metrics, and when to use each one. Metrics: Mean Squared Error - MSE Root Mean Squared Error - RMSE Mean Absolute Error - MAE R squared - RÂ² MSE: Mean Squared Error It is the average between the differece of prediction and real data, squared. It is a loss function, so to optimize we will try to minimize it.
